title: IFA 2015 : Hauwei G8 With Finger Print Scanner Annouced (All You Need To Know)
content:
Huawei has officially launched the Hauwei G8 handset at IFA 2015. 
 
The G8 features a 5.5-inch Full HD IPS LCD display, 2.5D Gorilla Glass and an all-metal chassis, octa-core Qualcomm Snapdragon 615 processor, 3GB of RAM, 32GB of on-board storage with microSD expansion up to 64GB. 
 

 
Other specs include, a 13MP rear-facing camera with optical image stabilization, a 5MP front-facing camera, dual SIM card slots,  3000mAh battery,  Android 5.1 Lollipop with Hauwei Emotion UI. There’s also a fingerprint scanner mounted on the back side of the handset, which Huawei says comes with its Fingerprint Sense 2.0 technology. 
 

 
This 4G LTE-capable device will be available sometime this month for the recommended price of 89 thousand naira. The device will launch in China, Egypt, Germany, Malaysia, Taiwan, Saudi Arabia, Nigeria and the United Kingdom. 
 
The post appeared first on 360Nobs.com .
